long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🎵🎵 ** How Does it Work? ** 🎵🎵

[New update] Download songs right on Suno site!

Rockin' on suno.com? Hit play on any song, and a sweet pink "Download This Song" button appears. Click it to grab that tune in seconds!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Got the song link elsewhere? No problem! Copy the link (it should look like https://suno.com/song/xxxxxx or https://app.suno.ai/song/xxxxxx).

Pop open this extension, paste that link, and BAM! Click "DOWNLOAD" to save your MP3. Easy peasy! 😝😝
long.zh_CN:
1. 链接秒下： 复制歌曲的分享链接，粘贴到扩展程序，一键获取MP3！
-- 或者 --
2. 直接下载： 在Suno网站上，点击播放歌曲，就会自动出现下载按钮！

告别繁琐，音乐想下就下！
